snippet: Negotiators will reconvene this week, over the objections of the National Rifle Association and other gun-rights advocates, to try to reach a deal on a global treaty to regulate sales of conventional weapons.
abstract: United Nations negotiators will reconvene, over the objections of the National Rifle Assn and other gun-rights advocates, to try to reach deal on global treaty to regulate global trade in conventional weapons.
lead_paragraph: Negotiators will reconvene this week, over the objections of the National Rifle Association and other gun-rights advocates, to try to reach a deal on a global treaty to regulate sales of conventional weapons.

headline.seo: U.N. Revives Effort to Finalize Arms Treaty
headline.main: U.N. Revives Effort on Pact to Regulate Arms Trade
headline.print_headline: U.N. Revives Effort on Pact To Regulate Arms Trade
